mapper.insert: insert into com_comic (id, name, description, cover_url, status, views, likes, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{views, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{likes, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModified, jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update:
update com_comic c
c.name = #{name},
c.description = #{description},
c.cover_url = #{coverUrl},
c.status = #{status},
c.views = #{views},
c.likes = #{likes},
c.gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
c.id = #{id}
update com_comic c left join com_chapter ch on ch.comic_id = c.id set c.views = c.views + 1 where ch.id = #{chapterId}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.views, c.likes, c.gmt_create, c.gmt_modified from com_comic c
select c.id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.views, c.likes, c.gmt_create, c.gmt_modified from com_comic c where c.name like concat('%', #{comicName}, '%')

select c.id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.views, c.likes, c.gmt_create, a.id a_id, a.name a_name, a.avatar a_avatar, ch.id c_id, ch.comic_id c_comic_id, ch.title c_title, ch.sub_title c_sub_title, ch.order c_order, ch.gmt_create c_gmt_create from com_comic c left join com_comic_author cca on cca.comic_id = c.id left join com_author a on cca.author_id = a.id left join com_chapter ch on ch.comic_id = c.id where c.id = #{id}

select distinct c.id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.views, c.likes, c.gmt_create, c.gmt_modified from com_comic c left join com_comic_author cca on cca.comic_id = c.id left join com_author a on cca.author_id = a.id where a.name like concat('%', #{authorName}, '%')

select distinct c.id, c.name, c.description, c.cover_url, c.status, c.views, c.likes, c.gmt_create, c.gmt_modified from com_comic c left join com_comic_category ccc on ccc.comic_id = c.id left join com_category ca on ccc.category_id = ca.id where ca.name like concat('%', #{categoryName}, '%')
